summary: Fat Albert and the Cosby Kids come to life and step out of their animated, inner-city Philadelphia world.
cast: Kenan Thompson|Kyla Pratt|Dania Ramirez|Shedrack Anderson III|Aaron Frazier|Marques Houston|Alphonso McAuley|Keith Robinson|Jermaine Williams|Aaron Carter|Omarion|J. Mack Slaughter|Nick Zano|Annie Abbott|Alice Greczyn|Rick Overton|Keri Lynn Pratt|Fonzworth Bentley|Jeff Leaf|Cody Fleetwood|Jeanne Chinn|Jenifer Yeuroukis|Alyssa Shafer|Dylan Cash|Damon Elliott|Jeff Harlan|Russell Cosby|James Bynum|Michael Honablue|Raven-Symoné|Jeremy Suarez|Earl Billings|Catero Colbert|Charles Duckworth|Ben Diskin|Josh Uhler|Bill Ratner|Bill Cosby|Tiana Brown Gandelman|Criscilla Anderson|Annalisia Simone|Michael Franklin|Richy Jackson|Reginald Jackson|Monique Gall|Donna Glytch|Shannon Rudolph|Michele Martinez|Storm Ascher|Nina Avetisova|Ray Buffer|Victoria Chalaya|Guy Chapman|Meghan Elizabeth|Jeff Garlin|Jobi Graham|Cathy Immordino|Mitch Kalamian|Jason Keever|Arron Kinser|Joe Koons|Mandi Leigh|Joel Madden|Mase|Clarence Perry|Nakell Rashad|Mark Silverman|William Stamey|Chris Watson
title: El gran Alberto
